story.book.view

Class StoryFragmentEditActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.app.Activity
      • android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity
        • story.book.view.StoryFragmentEditActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RequestingActivity, StoryView<StoryFragment>

    public class StoryFragmentEditActivity
extends android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity
implements StoryView<StoryFragment>, RequestingActivity
    StoryFragmentEditActivity is the interface users can make changes to illustrations contained in the story fragment which is currently open. All text illustrations displayed dynamically as EditTexts. All decision branches are displayed as buttons. Remove illustrations or branches by long pressing and selecting the corresponding option from the context menu.
    Author:
    Jessica Surya, Vina Nguyen, Anthony Ou

      • displayFragment

        private void displayFragment()
        displayFragments() displays all text illustrations as views and decision branches as buttons by getting them from the containing fragment. Used for updating all views in the activity. http://stackoverflow.com/questions/6583019/dynamic-textview-in-relative-layout http://stackoverflow.com/questions/3995215/add-and-remove-views-in-android-dynamically

      • formatButton

        private java.util.ArrayList<Button> formatButton(java.util.ArrayList<DecisionBranch> db,
                                       Context c)
        formatButton() creates a button with the corresponding decision branch text for each decision branch in an array list of decision branches by using the DecisionBranchButtonGenerator class This returns method an array list of buttons.
        Parameters:
        DecisionBranch - the decision branches associated with the fragment
        Context - the context where the button will be displayed
        Returns:
        a custom ArrayList

      • onUserSelectValue

        public void onUserSelectValue(java.lang.String title)
        Specified by:
        onUserSelectValue in interface RequestingActivity

      • editDecisionBranch

        private void editDecisionBranch(java.lang.String title)
        Edits the decision branch button. If a string is passed to the method, a new Decision Branch with the specified string will be recreated in place of the old one. If null is passed to the method, the Decision Branch will simply be deleted
        Parameters:
        text - which the Decision Branch text will be set to (optional)
